specification.title: Specification
specification.description: Specifies the name. Is displayed in round brackets, e.g. "Rind (gehacktes)"

linked-id.title: Linked to product (parent product)
linked-id.description: Specific fields which are not filled are inherited from this linked product

water-scarcity-footprint-id.title: Water scarcity footprint link*
water-scarcity-footprint-id.description: This WSF link overwrites the FAO link. If empty, the FAO link is used to determine the WSF value

processes.title: Processes*
processes.description: For the moment only for nutrition processes

allergenes.title: Allergenes*
allergenes.description: Comma sepearted list of the allergenes this product contains (gluten, crustaceans, eggs, fish, peanuts, soy, milk, nuts, celery, mustard, sesame, sulphur, lupin, molluscs)

alternatives.title: Alternatives
alternatives.description: Comma-separated list of other product id's

co2-calculation.title: Co2 calculation path for basic CO2-value

calculation-process-documentation.title: Calculation process documentation
calculation-process-documentation.description: Description of data used for CO2-calculation and important product traits

production-values.title: Production method parameters*
production-values.description: Comma-separated list of production values. Use S as placeholder for standard value.

conservation-values.title: Conservation method parameters*
conservation-values.description: Comma-separated list of conservation values. Use S as placeholder for standard value.

processing-values.title: Processing method parameters*
processing-values.description: Comma-separated list of processing values. Use S as placeholder for standard value.

packaging-values.title: Packaging method parameters*
packaging-values.description: Comma-separated list of packaging values. Use S as placeholder for standard value.

co2-calculation-parameters.title: CO2 calculation path for CO2 other than base value

info-text.title: Info text for cook
info-text.description: This information about a product will be displayed for a consumer / cook, like interesting facts about the CO2 value. Not implemented yet.
